text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Heeelp! Help me, please!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Oh, my Trainer! Help me! You gotta<n>save me!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: See, the thing is... I'm bein' chased<n>right now!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Really and truly! My pursuer's noneother than the ever-so-scaryUmamusume—no! The Umaboss—

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Ahaaa! There you are, Taiki!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Nooo! Umaboss, you're way too fast!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Who're you calling Umaboss?!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Help! Trainer, please help me!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Taiki hides behind me, cowering in<n>fear.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
So you're Taiki's trainer? Sorry, but<n>I'm gonna have to ask
you to turn her<n>over to me.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
This little troublemaker tried to sneak<n>out of the dorm after
curfew. As the<n>Miho Dorm leader, I can't let that<n>slide!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Now, hand her over!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: No, no, nooo! Don't hand me over,<n>pleeease!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I step aside and usher Taiki forward.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: What! How could ya, Trainer?!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Ahahaha! You found yourself a real<n>sensible trainer, Taiki! I
approve!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Now, let's get a move on! Prepare<n>yourself for an earful!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Nooooo!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Taiki's screams echo through the air<n>as she is forcefully led
away.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: A few minutes later...

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Nope, I can't find either of them!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: This isn't good...

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Oh, you there—excuse me! Have you<n>seen Amazon or Taiki
around here?
choice_data_list: Taiki just got hauled off for a lecture.
Taiki just got hauled off for a lecture.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Ahhh, so we're too late! Talk about<n>dropping the ball!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Amazon got the wrong idea about<n>Taiki, and it's our faults...

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Taiki did sneak out of the dorm after<n>curfew... But it was all
for our sake.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: See, me and Grass's parents live<n>overseas.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Since Taiki's in the same boat, she<n>threw a party for us so
we wouldn't<n>be lonely!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
We were all having so much fun, but<n>then the refreshments
ran out halfway<n>through.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: So Taiki said she was going to slip<n>out and buy more.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The image of Taiki assisting her ailing<n>classmate after
tryouts flashes into<n>my mind.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Though impulsive at times, she is<n>nevertheless a friendly
spirit who<n>takes notice of others and never<n>hesitates to
lend a helping hand.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Promising to clear things up, I head<n>off in the direction that
Taiki had been<n>dragged away.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Urgh... Cross my heart it won't<n>happen again... Wait, huh?
choice_data_list: Hishi Amazon! I need to talk to you!
Hishi Amazon! I need to talk to you!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Oh, it's you.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: What's all this about?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I explain the situation to Hishi<n>Amazon as it had been
relayed to me.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Ahh, so that's what happened. No<n>wonder you wouldn't tell
me the<n>reason. Didn't want the others to<n>take the blame,
huh?

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: W-well...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
To be honest, you did mention<n>something about a party a
few times<n>during your babbling, so I figured<n>there was
more to the story.
choice_data_list: Think you could go easy on her?
Think you could go easy on her?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
No can do. 'Fraid I'm not that soft.<n>She needs to be properly
punished!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Eep!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
There's a box full of candy and<n>snacks on a shelf in the
dorm kitchen.<n>Just so you know, it's reeeally<n>heavy.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Carry it to my room, and then bring El<n>and Grass there
too—pronto!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Huh? Wait, you don't mean...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
We're going to continue that<n>pick-me-up party of yours!
Hearing<n>your story actually made me a little<n>nostalgic for
home myself.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Let's get together with our fellow<n>Americans and make this
a night to<n>remember!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Gasp! Oh, Amazon! Thank yooou!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Ehehe... And thank you too, Trainer!I'm so, so happy that ya came tomy rescue!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Oh, I know! Why don't ya come party<n>with us? It's sure to
be real barn<n>burner!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Uh, trainers aren't even allowed to<n>set foot in the dorm. So
that's not<n>happening.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Nooo! Say it ain't so, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: All alone, I make my way back home.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Nooooo! Traineeeeer!
